strapiPost.title: New Ice Cream Joint Coming To MLK Jr Blvd In Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
Just what we need for this hot weather: a new ice cream joint! 

  • The knick of time: It will actually have burgers, too, so even better. The new shop is bright pink and called Icescreams and will open in July, according to its website and social media.
  • Yum: The building, formerly occupied by Flying Burger & Seafood, is located at 4220 W. Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd. The Icescreams menu is not yet released, but you can expect burgers, tenders, wings, and desserts such as ice cream, milkshakes, and other goodness.

Click HERE, and your mouth might water a little bit.
